system.descriptionText: Vehicle Gains +2 Armour to all locations and gains Reinforced Armour Trait. If it already had this trait it halves Critical Damage it would suffer again (to a minimum of 1). Takes Twice as long to repair Superior Plating than it does regular Armour Plating.

description.value: Vehicle Gains +2 Armour to all locations and gains Reinforced Armour Trait. If it already had this trait it halves Critical Damage it would suffer again (to a minimum of 1). Takes Twice as long to repair Superior Plating than it does regular Armour Plating.
